name: Cricket
info: Cricket is a sport that requires the use of a bat and ball. It is easily one of the most prevalent sports.

name: Hockey
info: Hockey is the national game of India. Also,it is a popular game,and interesting game.

name: Football
info: The football match is played with only two goalposts, a field and a football.

name: Volleyball
info: Volleyball is a team sport in which two teams of six players are separated by a net.

name: Badminton
info: Badminton is a type of indoor game which is played between either two teams or two players.

name: Bicylce
info: A bicycle is a useful vehicle that helps us reach a destination without polluting.
